name: Forgot The Flying Spell
description:
When you forget how to fly the only solution left is to fall in style

How to play:

You are a Wizard falling out of control, you can only use your magic to move the obstacles and avoid a certain death!

Every obstacle has a letter on it that indicates wich key moves it.

Hold that specific key (A, S, D, F) and left or right arrow to move the obstacle.

Try to reach the furthest and have fun!

Tip: you can´t move more than one obstacle at the time.
